h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 4 Secret Area
h2_title: How to Find the Venom Daoist for the Second Time
content: Take a sharp left at the top of the slope, to go up another set of stairs. Then go right up to the next set. At the top of these, look for an opening on the left that can be easily missed.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_4_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 4 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find the Venom Daoist for the Second Time'.
The content is as follows:
Take a sharp left at the top of the slope, to go up another set of stairs. Then go right up to the next set. At the top of these, look for an opening on the left that can be easily missed.
